member.name: DML_GRAPH_NODE_TYPE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify a type of graph node. See for the usage of this enumeration.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_NODE_TYPE.DML_GRAPH_NODE_TYPE_INVALID
member.summary: Specifies an unknown graph edge type, and is never valid. Using this value results in an error.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_NODE_TYPE.DML_GRAPH_NODE_TYPE_OPERATOR
member.summary: Specifies that the graph edge is described by the structure.
